Description: Simple demonstration of streamable MCP tools with both streaming and non-streaming capabilities
Author: MCP Framework Team

Tools.Name: simple_echo
Tools.Description: Regular (non-streaming) echo tool that returns the input text with timestamp

Parameters.Name: text
Parameters.Description: Text to echo back. If not provided, defaults to 'Hello Streamable World!'

Tools.Name: simple_count
Tools.Description: Non-streaming counter that generates a list of numbers with timestamps

Parameters.Name: count
Parameters.Description: Number of items to generate (1-100). Default is 5.

Tools.Name: stream_count
Tools.Description: Streaming counter that emits numbers one by one with progress updates

Parameters.Name: count
Parameters.Description: Number of items to stream (1-100). Default is 10.

Parameters.Name: delay
Parameters.Description: Delay in milliseconds between each number (0-5000). Default is 500ms.

Tools.Name: stream_text
Tools.Description: Streaming text generator that emits text word by word with progress

Parameters.Name: text
Parameters.Description: Text to stream word by word. Default is 'Hello from streaming world!'
